author: SkinnyTaste
name: Burst Tomato Cottage Cheese Caprese Bowl

ingredients.notes: I used whole, you can use 2%

instructions: Season tomatoes in a medium bowl with 1 teaspoon olive oil and pinch of salt. Air fry 400F 5 to 6 minutes, shaking the basket halfway, until they burst. Place cottage cheese in a bowl, top with tomatoes, drizzle more oil, balsamic glaze, salt, pepper, and garnish with basil.
